58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM (SELECT * FROM llpgcache WHERE {postcode_search_after} != '') tmp
WHERE (
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''

ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select a.*
		,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='2',house_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='3',street_out
																							   ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='2',house_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='3',street_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='3',street_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(a.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,a.test as available
		,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''),
				if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AddrConcat
from (
select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected,
	CONCAT(if(length(sao)>0,1,'')
			,if(length(pao)>0,2,'')
			,if(length(street_name)>0,3,'')
			,if(length(town_name)>0,4,'')) as test
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}) a","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"Select Comb.*
		,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
									 ,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='2',house_out
																  ,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='3',street_out
																							   ,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='2',house_out
									 ,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='3',street_out
																  ,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='3',street_out
									 ,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(Comb.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,Comb.test as available
		,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''),
				if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''),
				postcode_out5, zIPPostcode,
				if(country_out != '', concat(', ', country_out), '')) as AddrConcat
From
(select
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	IF({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	CONCAT(if(length({flat})>0,1,'')
			,if(length({house})>0,2,'')
			,if(length({street})>0,3,'')
			,if(length({town})>0,4,'')) as test,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun
Union select
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	'' as test,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun) as Comb
Where
	IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') = Comb.existSelected","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

','') ,if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from( select aq.* ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='1',flat_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1 ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2 ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3 ,if(substring(aq.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4 ,aq.test as available ,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''), if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat(', ', country_out), '')) as AddrConcat from ( select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer, CONCAT(if(length({flat_out1})>0,1,'') ,if(length({house_out1})>0,2,'') ,if(length({street_out1})>0,3,'') ,if(length({town_out1})>0,4,'')) as test) aq ) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,0) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,0) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,0) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[UBub]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: Output Table
props.defaultValue:
concat({#TTS},{#TRS},'Name',{#TRD},{name},{#TRC},
		{#TRS},'Address',{#TRD},{addressOfCollection},{#TRC},
		if({tel_cust} != '', concat(
		{#TRS},'Phone',{#TRD},{tel_cust},{#TRC}),''),
		if({mob_cust} != '', concat(
		{#TRS},'Mobile',{#TRD},{mob_cust},{#TRC}),''),
		if({email_cust} != '', concat(
		{#TRS},'Email',{#TRD},{email_cust},{#TRC}),''),
		{#TRS},'Types of Collection',{#TRD},
			{#sumRubbish},
			{#sumRecycling},
			{#sumFoodWaste},
			{#sumHealth},
			{#sumBulky},
			{#sumComRubbish},
			{#sumComRecycling},{#TRC},{#TTC})
